name: claude-plugins
description: Curated collection of custom Claude Code plugins and development tools.

plugins.name: ralph-loop
plugins.description: Continuous self-referential AI loops for interactive iterative development, implementing the Ralph Wiggum technique.

plugins.name: playwright-cli
plugins.description: Automates browser interactions for web testing, form filling, screenshots, and data extraction.

plugins.name: chess-opening-trainer
plugins.description: Conversational chess opening blunder explorer powered by the Lichess API. Identifies common blunders in specific openings using real game statistics and engine evaluations, then walks through punishment lines with unicode board positions.

plugins.name: git-management
plugins.description: Git workflow automation commands for building, committing, pushing, and creating pull requests in a single pipeline.

plugins.name: code-management
plugins.description: Language-specific build, lint, and format commands. Detects project type and runs the appropriate quality checks before committing.
